column5: I was at LeBaron in Markham tonight, they have store wide 15% off sale going on. I think it's on for tomorrow and Sat. as well. I wasn't going to buy that new spinning reel but I couldn't resist.
Crazy Ivan is a great handle.  Cheers.
Agreed. Do you turn to port or starboard at the bottom of the hour?
Thanks -  A hard turn and then neutral has caught me more than a few salmon downrigging on Lake O.
